summary.para: Notifies the sink that a view status of an object has changed.

param.name: dwViewStatus
param.para: The new view status. Possible values are from the enumeration.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success.

remarks.para: It is important that objects call the method whenever the object's view changes even when the object is in place active. Containers rely on this notification to keep an object's view up-to-date.

summary.para: This interface is derived from to provide extensions for notifying the sink of changes in an object's view status.
